tr_quotes.quote: İnanç kaybolduğunda insan da kaybolur
tr_quotes.author: John Green

tr_quotes.quote: İnandığınız gibi yaşamazsanız, yaşadığınız gibi inanmaya başlarsınız.
tr_quotes.author: Hz. Ömer (r.a.)

tr_quotes.quote: Kâinat Yaratıcısına olan inanç, ilmi araştırmanın en kuvvetli ve en asil muharrik gücüdür.
tr_quotes.author: AIbert Einstein

tr_quotes.quote: İnsanların en çok inandıkları şeyler, en az anladıklarıdır.
tr_quotes.author: Montaigne

tr_quotes.quote: İnsanları inandıkları şeylerden vazgeçirmek, bir şeye inandırmaktan daha zordur.
tr_quotes.author: Ernest Renan

tr_quotes.quote: Herkes, Cennet’e kendi yoluyla girer.
tr_quotes.author: Büyük Frederich

tr_quotes.quote: İnançsızlık büyük strestir, buna ancak güçlü insanlar dayanabilir.
tr_quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

tr_quotes.quote: Ancak Allah’a inandığım zaman, yaşadığımı anladım.
tr_quotes.author: Lev Tolstoy

tr_quotes.quote: Kuvvetli bir inançtan başka hiçbir şey, kuvvetli bir iş çıkaramaz.
tr_quotes.author: Honore de Balzac

tr_quotes.quote: Hiçbir davayı, hiçbir inancı, bir katilin kurşunları öldüremez.
tr_quotes.author: John F. Kennedy

tr_quotes.quote: İnançlı olan bir kişinin gücü, sadece ilgisi olan doksan dokuz kişinin gücüne eşittir.
tr_quotes.author: John Stuart Mili

tr_quotes.quote: Umumiyetle insanlar, arzu ettikleri şeylere kolayca inanırlar.
tr_quotes.author: Julius Caesar

tr_quotes.quote: İnandığımız şeyin, bir yabancının ağzından tekrarlandığını duymak bize zevk verir.
tr_quotes.author: Wolfgang Van Goethe

tr_quotes.quote: Hiçbir şeye inanmayan insan, bir bardak içindeki köksüz çiçeğe benzer.
tr_quotes.author: L. Borne

tr_quotes.quote: İnsan inançlarının eseridir, nasıl inanıyorsa öyledir.
tr_quotes.author: Bhagavad Gita

tr_quotes.quote: Gördüklerim, beni görmediğim yaratıcıya inanmaya mecbur ediyor.
tr_quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

tr_quotes.quote: Batıl inanış, zayıf kafaların dinidir.
tr_quotes.author: Eflatun

tr_quotes.quote: İnanç, görmediğimize inanmaktır, bunun ödülü ise inandığımızı görmektir.
tr_quotes.author: Saint Augustinus

tr_quotes.quote: İnsan korkusundan utanç, Allah korkusundan inanç doğar.
tr_quotes.author: Samuel Johnson

tr_quotes.quote: Nerede bir saray yaptırsam, yanında bir cami yaptırmasam Allah’tan utanırım.
tr_quotes.author: Tuğrul Bey

tr_quotes.quote: İnanç, arzuya dönüşen aşktır.
tr_quotes.author: William Ellery Channing

tr_quotes.quote: Hepimiz için en büyük mutluluk, her çağda, inançları için direnecek kadar güçlü ve yürekli kişilerin yetişmesidir.
tr_quotes.author: Robert G. Ingersol

tr_quotes.quote: İnanç, yaşamanın gücüdür.
tr_quotes.author: Lev Tolstoy

tr_quotes.quote: Eğer kendi kendinize inanıyorsanız, diğer kimseler de size inanacaktır.
tr_quotes.author: Wolfgang Van Goethe

tr_quotes.quote: Bir şeye inancı pekiştirmeden önce, birbirimize inanmayı öğrenmeliyiz.
tr_quotes.author: Yevtuşenko

tr_quotes.quote: Benim için gerçek inanç, gücümü en iyi kullandıran, değerlerimi en iyi eyleme geçiren inançtır.
tr_quotes.author: Andre Gide

tr_quotes.quote: Dünya ve insanlık tarihinin asıl, biricik ve en derin ve öteki bütün konuların üstünde olan konusu, inançsızlıkla inanç arasındaki çekişmedir.
tr_quotes.author: Wolfgang Van Goethe

tr_quotes.quote: İnanmak, dolu dolu yaşamaktır.
tr_quotes.author: Gürbüz Azak

tr_quotes.quote: İnsanların inancı yoksa acaba ne işe yararlar, bir araç bir güç kaynağına bağlanmazsa yol alabilir mi?
tr_quotes.author: Confucius

tr_quotes.quote: İnanç dersini, doğadan alabilenlere ne mutlu.
tr_quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

tr_quotes.quote: Eğer kendi kendinize inanıyorsanız, diğer kimseler de size inanacaktır
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: İnançsızlık büyük strestir, buna ancak güçlü insanlar dayanabilir.
tr_quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

tr_quotes.quote: Şimdi inanç neyi ümit ettiğimizden ve neyi görmediğimizden çok emin.
tr_quotes.author: Havari Paul

tr_quotes.quote: Asla başka insanlar üzülecek diye kendini üzme, sen kaldırabiliyorsan onlar da kaldırabilir.
tr_quotes.author: Bob Marley

tr_quotes.quote: İman, her şeye can verir; bir insan veya bir millet inanmaya başladı mı çabucak büyür, yükselir ve yükseltir; yenilmez bir kuvvet hâline gelir.
tr_quotes.author: Thomas Carlyle

tr_quotes.quote: Umumiyetle insanlar, arzu ettikleri şeylere kolayca inanırlar.
tr_quotes.author: Julius Caesar

tr_quotes.quote: İnanmak istemeyeni hiçbir mantık inandıramaz.
tr_quotes.author: Cenap Şahabettin

tr_quotes.quote: Balmumundan inançlara sahip olduğunuz müddetçe güneşten uzaklaşın.
tr_quotes.author: Epictetos

tr_quotes.quote: İnanç, görmediğimize inanmaktır, bunun ödülü ise inandığımızı görmektir.
tr_quotes.author: Saint Augustinus

tr_quotes.quote: Akıllı insanı inandırabilirsiniz, cahil insanı biraz zorlanarak inandırırsınız ama yarı cahil bir insanı hiçbir zaman inandıramazsınız.
tr_quotes.author: Coronet

tr_quotes.quote: İnancın, ne gerçekliğin içinde bir temeli, ne de gözle görünür bir desteği vardır, ama yine de bir köprü gibi, bizi şimdiki gerçeklikten sonsuza bağlar ve bize destek olur.
tr_quotes.author: Emily Dickinson

tr_quotes.quote: İnanıyorum diyoruz, acaba günümüzün ne kadarını “inandığımızı yaşayarak” geçiriyoruz?
tr_quotes.author: Ali Suad

tr_quotes.quote: İnandığı şeyi yapan insanın enerjisi asla tükenmez.
tr_quotes.author: Goethe

tr_quotes.quote: Çağdaş toplumda inançsız zengin bir erkek, daha tehlikelidir iffetsiz yoksul bir kadından.
tr_quotes.author: Bernard Shaw

tr_quotes.quote: İnanç, Tanrı’nın yüceliğine ve güzelliğine karşı duyulan güven duygusudur. Bu, öylesine kesin bir duygudur ki, insan bunun için hayatım binlerce kez tehlikeye atabilir.
tr_quotes.author: Martin Luther

tr_quotes.quote: Eğer heyecan üretemezseniz pek fazla şey üretemezsiniz.
tr_quotes.author: Bill Marriott

tr_quotes.quote: Hayatın zevkini ve lezzetini isterseniz hayatınızı iman ile hayatlandırınız, farzlarla süsleyiniz ve günahlardan çekinmekle muhafaza ediniz.
tr_quotes.author: Said Nursi

tr_quotes.quote: İnsan inançlarının eseridir, nasıl inanıyorsa öyledir.
tr_quotes.author: Bhagavad Gita

tr_quotes.quote: Büyük işler başarmak için sadece harekete geçmek yetmez, ne yapmak istediğinizin rüyasını da görmek gerek; sadece rüyasını görmek yetmez, rüyanın gerçekleşebileceğine inanmak gerek.
tr_quotes.author: Anatole France

tr_quotes.quote: Ancak Allah’a inandığım zaman, yaşadığımı anladım.
tr_quotes.author: Lev Tolstoy

tr_quotes.quote: İnançlı olan bir kişinin gücü, sadece ilgisi olan doksan dokuz kişinin gücüne eşittir.
tr_quotes.author: John Stuart Mili

tr_quotes.quote: Dünyada en çok korktuğum insanlar, her şeye inanan, inandıklarına göre davranan ve her amaç için oy verenlerdir.
tr_quotes.author: P. B. Shelley

tr_quotes.quote: Bir şeye inancı pekiştirmeden önce, birbirimize inanmayı öğrenmeliyiz.
tr_quotes.author: Yevtuşenko

en_quotes.quote: He wants you all to Himself to put His loving, divine arms around you
en_quotes.author: Charles Stanley

en_quotes.quote: Faith is the bird that feels the light when the dawn is still dark
en_quotes.author: Rabindranath Tagore

en_quotes.quote: With faith, discipline and selfless devotion to duty, there is nothing worthwhile that you cannot achieve
en_quotes.author: Muhammad Ali Jinnah

en_quotes.quote: Stand straight, walk proud, have a little faith
en_quotes.author: Garth Brooks

en_quotes.quote: Prayer should be the key of the day and the lock of the night
en_quotes.author: George Herbert

en_quotes.quote: To one who has faith, no explanation is necessary. To one without faith, no explanation is possible
en_quotes.author: Thomas Aquinas

en_quotes.quote: In faith there is enough light for those who want to believe and enough shadows to blind those who don't
en_quotes.author: Blaise Pascal

en_quotes.quote: Without faith, nothing is possible. With it, nothing is impossible
en_quotes.author: Mary McLeod Bethune

en_quotes.quote: He who has courage and faith will never perish in misery!
en_quotes.author: Anne Frank

en_quotes.quote: Obedience is the fruit of faith
en_quotes.author: Christina Rossetti

en_quotes.quote: Sometimes you find your strongest faith in the darkest corners
en_quotes.author: Margo Price

en_quotes.quote: Faith is the first factor in a life devoted to service. Without it, nothing is possible. With it, nothing is impossible
en_quotes.author: Mary McLeod Bethune

en_quotes.quote: Sometimes all you need is a big leap of faith
en_quotes.author: Sean Bean

en_quotes.quote: Faith Hill is a big role model
en_quotes.author: Taylor Swift

en_quotes.quote: Every tomorrow has two handles. We can take hold of it with the handle of anxiety or the handle of faith
en_quotes.author: Henry Ward Beecher

en_quotes.quote: Creativity is always a leap of faith. You're faced with a blank page, blank easel, or an empty stage
en_quotes.author: Julia Cameron

en_quotes.quote: You must never give up and have faith in yourself
en_quotes.author: Luka Modric

en_quotes.quote: I learned early on the magic of life is having a vision, having faith, and then going for it
en_quotes.author: Elaine Welteroth

en_quotes.quote: Do not tell secrets to those whose faith and silence you have not already tested
en_quotes.author: Elizabeth I

en_quotes.quote: I am not disturbed by criticism or insults. It's all about having faith in yourself
en_quotes.author: Gonzalo Higuain

en_quotes.quote: Anyone can be a hero. You just have to have faith in yourself
en_quotes.author: Masi Oka

en_quotes.quote: There is but one cause of human failure. And that is man's lack of faith in his true Self
en_quotes.author: William James

en_quotes.quote: Non-violence requires a double faith, faith in God and also faith in man
en_quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

en_quotes.quote: It is truer to say that martyrs create faith more than faith creates martyrs
en_quotes.author: Miguel de Unamuno

en_quotes.quote: Faith is the ticket to the feast, not the feast
en_quotes.author: Edwin Louis Cole

en_quotes.quote: Painting is a faith, and it imposes the duty to disregard public opinion
en_quotes.author: Vincent Van Gogh

en_quotes.quote: Writing is an act of faith, not a trick of grammar
en_quotes.author: E. B. White

en_quotes.quote: Prayer is as natural an expression of faith as breathing is of life
en_quotes.author: Jonathan Edwards

en_quotes.quote: Without prayer, without faith in the Almighty, the civil rights movement would have been like a bird without wings
en_quotes.author: John Lewis

en_quotes.quote: No human race is superior; no religious faith is inferior. All collective judgments are wrong. Only racists make them
en_quotes.author: Elie Wiesel

en_quotes.quote: Seeds of faith are always within us; sometimes it takes a crisis to nourish and encourage their growth
en_quotes.author: Susan L. Taylor

en_quotes.quote: I have great faith in fools; self-confidence my friends call it
en_quotes.author: Edgar Allan Poe

en_quotes.quote: Faith: not wanting to know what is true
en_quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

en_quotes.quote: The dearest friend on earth is a mere shadow compared to Jesus Christ
en_quotes.author: Oswald Chambers

en_quotes.quote: Believers, look up - take courage. The angels are nearer than you think
en_quotes.author: Billy Graham

en_quotes.quote: Faith makes all things possible... love makes all things easy
en_quotes.author: Dwight L. Moody

en_quotes.quote: Faith is different from proof; the latter is human, the former is a Gift from God
en_quotes.author: Blaise Pascal

en_quotes.quote: Unwearied ceaseless effort is the price that must be paid for turning faith into a rich infallible experience
en_quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

en_quotes.quote: Liberty cannot be established without morality, nor morality without faith
en_quotes.author: Alexis de Tocqueville

en_quotes.quote: Faith in oneself is the best and safest course
en_quotes.author: Michelangelo

en_quotes.quote: Faith crosses every border and touches every heart in every nation
en_quotes.author: George W. Bush

en_quotes.quote: Asking in faith requires honesty, effort, commitment, and persistence
en_quotes.author: David A. Bednar

en_quotes.quote: It's faith in something and enthusiasm for something that makes a life worth living
en_quotes.author: Oliver Wendell Holmes, Sr.

en_quotes.quote: No lover, if he be of good faith, and sincere, will deny he would prefer to see his mistress dead than unfaithful
en_quotes.author: Marquis de Sade

en_quotes.quote: As long as I have my faith in God, I'm good. I know everything else is going to come
en_quotes.author: Derrick Rose

en_quotes.quote: Put your faith in God and confidence in yourself
en_quotes.author: Alberta Hunter

en_quotes.quote: Hold firmly that our faith is identical with that of the ancients. Deny this, and you dissolve the unity of the Church
en_quotes.author: Thomas Aquinas

en_quotes.quote: Let no rank puff up anyone; for faith and love are paramount - the greatest blessings in the world
en_quotes.author: Ignatius of Antioch

en_quotes.quote: And Jesus, the heart of the Christian faith is the wildest, most radical guy you'd ever come across
en_quotes.author: Bear Grylls

en_quotes.quote: Charity can be the outward expression of faith and hope
en_quotes.author: Joseph B. Wirthlin

en_quotes.quote: As reason is a rebel to faith, so passion is a rebel to reason
en_quotes.author: Thomas Browne

en_quotes.quote: We are twice armed if we fight with faith
en_quotes.author: Plato

en_quotes.quote: A casual stroll through the lunatic asylum shows that faith does not prove anything
en_quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

en_quotes.quote: Only the person who has faith in himself is able to be faithful to others
en_quotes.author: Erich Fromm

en_quotes.quote: A better world shall emerge based on faith and understanding
en_quotes.author: Douglas MacArthur

en_quotes.quote: Obedience is an act of faith; disobedience is the result of unbelief
en_quotes.author: Edwin Louis Cole

en_quotes.quote: I'm a strong man of faith
en_quotes.author: Darryl Glenn

en_quotes.quote: We are never defeated unless we give up on God
en_quotes.author: Ronald Reagan

en_quotes.quote: It's lack of faith that makes people afraid of meeting challenges, and I believed in myself
en_quotes.author: Muhammad Ali

en_quotes.quote: Each one prays to God according to his own light
en_quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

en_quotes.quote: Doubt is not the opposite of faith; it is one element of faith
en_quotes.author: Paul Tillich

en_quotes.quote: Faith is not something to grasp, it is a state to grow into
en_quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

en_quotes.quote: God never made a promise that was too good to be true
en_quotes.author: Dwight L. Moody

en_quotes.quote: And the attitude of faith is the very opposite of clinging to belief, of holding on
en_quotes.author: Alan Watts

en_quotes.quote: How many things we held yesterday as articles of faith which today we tell as fables
en_quotes.author: Michel de Montaigne

en_quotes.quote: But for my faith in God, I should have been a raving maniac
en_quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

en_quotes.quote: I don't have to have faith, I have experience
en_quotes.author: Joseph Campbell

en_quotes.quote: Faith is an oasis in the heart which will never be reached by the caravan of thinking
en_quotes.author: Khalil Gibran

en_quotes.quote: Only our individual faith in freedom can keep us free
en_quotes.author: Dwight D. Eisenhower

en_quotes.quote: You were made by God and for God, and until you understand that, life will never make sense
en_quotes.author: Rick Warren

en_quotes.quote: You can judge the quality of their faith from the way they behave. Discipline is an index to doctrine
en_quotes.author: Tertullian

en_quotes.quote: Unity in faith is theocracy; unity in politics is fascism
en_quotes.author: Maajid Nawaz

en_quotes.quote: To believe only possibilities is not faith, but mere philosophy
en_quotes.author: Thomas Browne

en_quotes.quote: Faith is the highest passion in a human being. Many in every generation may not come that far, but none comes further
en_quotes.author: Soren Kierkegaard

en_quotes.quote: I would not attack the faith of a heathen without being sure I had a better one to put in its place
en_quotes.author: Harriet Beecher Stowe

en_quotes.quote: Be a sinner and sin strongly, but more strongly have faith and rejoice in Christ
en_quotes.author: Martin Luther

en_quotes.quote: Belief in a cruel God makes a cruel man
en_quotes.author: Thomas Paine

en_quotes.quote: We see ourselves in terms of yesterday and today. Our Heavenly Father sees us in terms of forever
en_quotes.author: Joseph B. Wirthlin

en_quotes.quote: I am totally convinced the Christian faith is the most coherent worldview around
en_quotes.author: Ravi Zacharias

en_quotes.quote: In e-commerce, your prices have to be better because the consumer has to take a leap of faith in your product
en_quotes.author: Ashton Kutcher

en_quotes.quote: Art used to be made in the name of faith. We made cathedrals, we made stained-glass windows, we made murals
en_quotes.author: Julia Cameron

en_quotes.quote: Is it faith to understand nothing, and merely submit your convictions implicitly to the Church?
en_quotes.author: John Calvin

en_quotes.quote: I was raised to believe in hard work, in faith and family
en_quotes.author: Mike Pence

en_quotes.quote: A faith is a necessity to a man. Woe to him who believes in nothing
en_quotes.author: Victor Hugo

en_quotes.quote: Faith and doubt cannot exist in the same mind at the same time, for one will dispel the other
en_quotes.author: Thomas S. Monson

en_quotes.quote: Faith is not believing that God can. It is knowing that God will
en_quotes.author: Ben Stein

en_quotes.quote: I don't know if my faith stems from what I'd call unconditional love, but the energy certainly feels boundless
en_quotes.author: Stacey D'Erasmo

en_quotes.quote: If you think you can win, you can win. Faith is necessary to victory
en_quotes.author: William Hazlitt

en_quotes.quote: Faith, like a jackal, feeds among the tombs, and even from these dead doubts she gathers her most vital hope
en_quotes.author: Herman Melville

en_quotes.quote: Hope, like faith, is nothing if it is not courageous; it is nothing if it is not ridiculous
en_quotes.author: Thornton Wilder

en_quotes.quote: Faith is in the eye of the beholder
en_quotes.author: Tilda Swinton

en_quotes.quote: My reason nourishes my faith and my faith my reason
en_quotes.author: Norman Cousins

en_quotes.quote: Ultimately, blind faith is the only kind
en_quotes.author: Mason Cooley

en_quotes.quote: I never lost my faith
en_quotes.author: Big K.R.I.T.

en_quotes.quote: I believe though I do not comprehend, and I hold by faith what I cannot grasp with the mind
en_quotes.author: Saint Bernard

en_quotes.quote: My faith and my beliefs sustain me through all of the craziness that this life brings
en_quotes.author: Jay DeMarcus

en_quotes.quote: God always takes the simplest way
en_quotes.author: Albert Einstein

en_quotes.quote: The love of heaven makes one heavenly
en_quotes.author: William Shakespeare

en_quotes.quote: Lets have faith that right makes might; and in that faith let us, to the end, dare to do our duty as we understand it
en_quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

en_quotes.quote: Don't let the winds blow your dreams away... or steal your faith in God
en_quotes.author: Vin Scully

en_quotes.quote: Faith never makes a confession
en_quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

en_quotes.quote: A library implies an act of faith
en_quotes.author: Victor Hugo

en_quotes.quote: God enters by a private door into every individual
en_quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

en_quotes.quote: Faith... must be enforced by reason... when faith becomes blind it dies
en_quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

en_quotes.quote: Doubt is a pain too lonely to know that faith is his twin brother
en_quotes.author: Khalil Gibran

en_quotes.quote: Faith, there hath been many great men that have flattered the people who ne'er loved them
en_quotes.author: William Shakespeare

en_quotes.quote: Faith is about trusting God when you have unanswered questions
en_quotes.author: Joel Osteen

en_quotes.quote: Non-violence is the article of faith
en_quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

en_quotes.quote: Our faith comes in moments; our vice is habitual
en_quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

en_quotes.quote: The faith that stands on authority is not faith
en_quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

en_quotes.quote: Faith is permitting ourselves to be seized by the things we do not see
en_quotes.author: Martin Luther

en_quotes.quote: I'm very keen on having true freedom of expression. True freedom of faith. And free practice of religious faith
en_quotes.author: Mohammed Morsi

en_quotes.quote: Faith keeps many doubts in her pay. If I could not doubt, I should not believe
en_quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

en_quotes.quote: Intolerance betrays want of faith in one's cause
en_quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

en_quotes.quote: I die the king's faithful servant, but God's first
en_quotes.author: Thomas More

en_quotes.quote: I wish everybody finds the serenity that good, strong faith brings
en_quotes.author: Ann Jillian

en_quotes.quote: God... a being whose only definition is that he is beyond man's power to conceive
en_quotes.author: Ayn Rand

en_quotes.quote: In the affairs of this world, men are saved not by faith, but by the want of it
en_quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

en_quotes.quote: The way to see by Faith is to shut the Eye of Reason
en_quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

en_quotes.quote: My faith helps me overcome such negative emotions and find my equilibrium
en_quotes.author: Dalai Lama

en_quotes.quote: To insure the adoration of a theorem for any length of time, faith is not enough, a police force is needed as well
en_quotes.author: Albert Camus

en_quotes.quote: Love, like a chicken salad or restaurant hash, must be taken with blind faith or it loses its flavor
en_quotes.author: Helen Rowland

en_quotes.quote: I believe in spirits. I believe in faith. I believe in spirituality. I believe in aliens as well
en_quotes.author: James Wan

en_quotes.quote: To believe in God is impossible not to believe in Him is absurd
en_quotes.author: Voltaire

en_quotes.quote: I live and love in God's peculiar light
en_quotes.author: Michelangelo

en_quotes.quote: You know, my faith is one that admits some doubt
en_quotes.author: Barack Obama

en_quotes.quote: There lives more faith in honest doubt, believe me, than in half the creeds
en_quotes.author: Alfred Lord Tennyson

en_quotes.quote: Faith is easy; I think people complicate it
en_quotes.author: Joel Osteen

en_quotes.quote: Family and friends and faith are the most important things in your life and you should be building friendships
en_quotes.author: Barbara Bush

en_quotes.quote: Life is only a long and bitter suicide, and faith alone can transform this suicide into a sacrifice
en_quotes.author: Franz Liszt

en_quotes.quote: In the Church, and in the journey of faith, women have had and still have a special role in opening doors to the Lord
en_quotes.author: Pope Francis

en_quotes.quote: Faith is much better than belief. Belief is when someone else does the thinking
en_quotes.author: R. Buckminster Fuller

en_quotes.quote: I have faith that God often uses our deepest pain as the launching pad of our greatest calling
en_quotes.author: Yolanda Hadid

en_quotes.quote: Faith may be defined briefly as an illogical belief in the occurrence of the improbable
en_quotes.author: H. L. Mencken

en_quotes.quote: Reason is the enemy of faith
en_quotes.author: Martin Luther

en_quotes.quote: Pray, and let God worry
en_quotes.author: Martin Luther

en_quotes.quote: Pray for intestinal fortitude, work hard, and keep the faith. Oh, and pray for good luck, you're gonna need it
en_quotes.author: Jerry Reed

en_quotes.quote: If you have God on your side, everything becomes clear
en_quotes.author: Ayrton Senna

en_quotes.quote: Not brute force but only persuasion and faith are the kings of this world
en_quotes.author: Thomas Carlyle

en_quotes.quote: A wise ruler ought never to keep faith when by doing so it would be against his interests
en_quotes.author: Niccolo Machiavelli

en_quotes.quote: The Resurrection is at the core of our beliefs as Christians. Without it, our faith is meaningless
en_quotes.author: Joseph B. Wirthlin

en_quotes.quote: True faith is focused in and on the Lord Jesus Christ and always leads to action
en_quotes.author: David A. Bednar

en_quotes.quote: Have faith in God; God has faith in you
en_quotes.author: Edwin Louis Cole

en_quotes.quote: In my opinion, faith helps in many contexts
en_quotes.author: Fedor Emelianenko

en_quotes.quote: Have a little faith, kick a little dirt
en_quotes.author: Diane Ladd

en_quotes.quote: I am one of those who would rather sink with faith than swim without it
en_quotes.author: Stanley Baldwin

en_quotes.quote: I have come to the conclusion that the most important element in human life is faith
en_quotes.author: Rose Kennedy

en_quotes.quote: Faith is a passionate intuition
en_quotes.author: William Wordsworth

en_quotes.quote: Reason is our soul's left hand, faith her right
en_quotes.author: John Donne

en_quotes.quote: Faith is an act of a finite being who is grasped by, and turned to, the infinite
en_quotes.author: Paul Tillich

en_quotes.quote: What is faith but a kind of betting or speculation after all? It should be, I bet that my Redeemer liveth
en_quotes.author: Samuel Butler

en_quotes.quote: A man of courage is also full of faith
en_quotes.author: Marcus Tullius Cicero

en_quotes.quote: I have this unshakeable faith. I believe in myself; I believe in God
en_quotes.author: Laurence Fishburne

en_quotes.quote: No matter what we face, put your total faith in God, and in time - not our time, but His time - He'll bring us through
en_quotes.author: Lex Luger

en_quotes.quote: Our faith is released as we say, pray and do the Word
en_quotes.author: Joyce Meyer

en_quotes.quote: Faith, mighty faith, the promise sees, And looks to God alone; Laughs at impossibilities, And cries it shall be done
en_quotes.author: Charles Wesley

en_quotes.quote: My faith has always been important to me. It defines who I am
en_quotes.author: Katie Ledecky

en_quotes.quote: Is a faith without action a sincere faith?
en_quotes.author: Jean Racine

en_quotes.quote: We have elected to put our money and faith in a mathematical framework that is free of politics and human error
en_quotes.author: Tyler Winklevoss

en_quotes.quote: I am sorry for causing anyone to lose faith in sport
en_quotes.author: Lizzie Armitstead

en_quotes.quote: Have faith in your intuition and listen to your gut feeling
en_quotes.author: Ann Cotton

en_quotes.quote: Know why you believe, understand what you believe, and possess a reason for the faith that is in you
en_quotes.author: Frances Wright

en_quotes.quote: I would say my poise comes from my faith
en_quotes.author: Tua Tagovailoa

en_quotes.quote: I never really had the classic struggle. I had faith
en_quotes.author: Denzel Washington

en_quotes.quote: Our faith is faith in someone else's faith, and in the greatest matters this is most the case
en_quotes.author: William James

en_quotes.quote: Happy is the son whose faith in his mother remains unchallenged
en_quotes.author: Louisa May Alcott

en_quotes.quote: I don't think you ever really know what all you're doing, so you have to act on faith
en_quotes.author: Dolly Parton

en_quotes.quote: To me faith means not worrying
en_quotes.author: John Dewey

en_quotes.quote: I've had faith my whole life that there was someone looking out for me, a spirit guide, a soul guide
en_quotes.author: Lady Gaga

en_quotes.quote: Faith is what someone knows to be true, whether they believe it or not
en_quotes.author: Flannery O'Connor

en_quotes.quote: There's a huge amount of faith and confidence in the stunt team
en_quotes.author: Jason Statham

en_quotes.quote: Faith must trample under foot all reason, sense, and understanding
en_quotes.author: Martin Luther

en_quotes.quote: The Bible is our rule of faith and doctrine
en_quotes.author: Ellen G. White

en_quotes.quote: I see heaven's glories shine and faith shines equal
en_quotes.author: Emily Bronte

en_quotes.quote: Faith moves mountains, but you have to keep pushing while you are praying
en_quotes.author: Mason Cooley

en_quotes.quote: Faith embraces many truths which seem to contradict each other
en_quotes.author: Blaise Pascal

en_quotes.quote: Faith certainly tells us what the senses do not, but not the contrary of what they see; it is above, not against them
en_quotes.author: Blaise Pascal

en_quotes.quote: I have faith in faith. God is there, whether we have faith or not, so why not have faith in him?
en_quotes.author: Valerie Bertinelli

en_quotes.quote: Fight the good fight of faith, and God will give you spiritual mercies
en_quotes.author: George Whitefield

en_quotes.quote: To disbelieve is easy; to scoff is simple; to have faith is harder
en_quotes.author: Louis L'Amour

en_quotes.quote: Faith is the black person's federal reserve system
en_quotes.author: Hattie McDaniel

en_quotes.quote: I have learned that track doesn't define me. My faith defines me. I'm running because I have been blessed with a gift
en_quotes.author: Allyson Felix

en_quotes.quote: I spend a lot of time balancing between faith and disbelief
en_quotes.author: Taylor Swift

en_quotes.quote: Keep the faith; work hard: practice does make you perfect. Do what you can, and meet the right people to make it work
en_quotes.author: Christina Milian

en_quotes.quote: I believe in faith, family and country. I really keep it that simple
en_quotes.author: Sean Hannity

en_quotes.quote: Keep your faith in God, but keep your powder dry
en_quotes.author: Oliver Cromwell

en_quotes.quote: I want to be remembered as the person who helped us restore faith in ourselves
en_quotes.author: Wilma Mankiller

en_quotes.quote: We can no more do without spirituality than we can do without food, shelter, or clothing
en_quotes.author: Ernest Holmes

en_quotes.quote: There have to be people who are vocal about the advancement of knowledge over faith
en_quotes.author: Seth MacFarlane

en_quotes.quote: Wherever God has given faith, it is given, among other reasons, for the very purpose of being tried
en_quotes.author: George Muller

en_quotes.quote: Embrace every opportunity of exercising kind feelings and doing good to others, especially to the household of faith
en_quotes.author: Adoniram Judson

en_quotes.quote: The investigator should have a robust faith - and yet not believe
en_quotes.author: Claude Bernard

en_quotes.quote: In the Christian faith, God really puts suffering front and center. He doesn't get squeamish about it
en_quotes.author: Joni Eareckson Tada

en_quotes.quote: I believe everything happens in life for a reason, and you just need to have faith and keep doing what you do
en_quotes.author: Jennifer Winget

en_quotes.quote: You block your dream when you allow your fear to grow bigger than your faith
en_quotes.author: Mary Manin Morrissey

en_quotes.quote: Faith and doubt both are needed - not as antagonists, but working side by side to take us around the unknown curve
en_quotes.author: Lillian Smith

en_quotes.quote: I think it's imperative to have faith or religion, because it's good to have morals, to be kind to others
en_quotes.author: Tinie Tempah

en_quotes.quote: There's a loss of faith in the banking system that for so long has been the backbone of prosperity and growth
en_quotes.author: Lucy Powell

en_quotes.quote: I haven't lost faith in human nature and I haven't decided to be less compassionate to strangers
en_quotes.author: Armistead Maupin

en_quotes.quote: Faith is not a sense, nor sight, nor reason, but taking God at His work
en_quotes.author: Faith Evans

en_quotes.quote: Film is an illusion. Fame is ephemeral. Faith and family are what endure
en_quotes.author: Emilio Estevez

en_quotes.quote: But every act in consequence of our faith, strengthens faith
en_quotes.author: Anna Letitia Barbauld

en_quotes.quote: Vision looks upward and becomes faith
en_quotes.author: Stephen Samuel Wise

en_quotes.quote: I can't prove it scientifically, that there's a God, but I believe
en_quotes.author: Billy Graham

en_quotes.quote: To study history means submitting to chaos and nevertheless retaining faith in order and meaning
en_quotes.author: Hermann Hesse

en_quotes.quote: Duty cannot exist without faith
en_quotes.author: Benjamin Disraeli

en_quotes.quote: I have tremendous faith in President Obama's skills. He's a long-term visionary
en_quotes.author: Deepak Chopra

en_quotes.quote: Faith means belief in something concerning which doubt is theoretically possible
en_quotes.author: William James

en_quotes.quote: Faith is an aptitude of the spirit. It is, in fact, a talent: you must be born with it
en_quotes.author: Anton Chekhov

en_quotes.quote: Faith in a holy cause is to a considerable extent a substitute for lost faith in ourselves
en_quotes.author: Eric Hoffer

en_quotes.quote: I try to stay centered in my faith and my family and the close people around me
en_quotes.author: Tim Tebow

en_quotes.quote: The man who radiates good cheer, who makes life happier wherever he meets it, is always a man of vision and faith
en_quotes.author: Ella Wheeler Wilcox

en_quotes.quote: I have no mystic faith in the people. I have in the individual
en_quotes.author: E. M. Forster

en_quotes.quote: Between understanding and faith immediate connections must subsist
en_quotes.author: Marquis de Sade

en_quotes.quote: For modes of faith let graceless zealots fight, His can't be wrong whose life is in the right
en_quotes.author: Alexander Pope

en_quotes.quote: If you desire faith, then you have faith enough
en_quotes.author: Elizabeth Barrett Browning

en_quotes.quote: If there was no faith there would be no living in this world. We could not even eat hash with any safety
en_quotes.author: Josh Billings

en_quotes.quote: Is he alone who has courage on his right hand and faith on his left hand?
en_quotes.author: Charles Lindbergh

en_quotes.quote: I consider myself a Christian. I attend church. My faith has sustained me in very difficult times
en_quotes.author: John McCain

en_quotes.quote: Faith which does not doubt is dead faith
en_quotes.author: Miguel de Unamuno

en_quotes.quote: I'm not religious, but I understand the need for faith and hope
en_quotes.author: Andy Biersack

en_quotes.quote: The man of science has learned to believe in justification, not by faith, but by verification
en_quotes.author: Thomas Huxley

en_quotes.quote: Theater is my temple and my religion and my act of faith. Strangers sit in a room together and believe together
en_quotes.author: Harvey Fierstein

en_quotes.quote: Society lives by faith, and develops by science
en_quotes.author: Henri Frederic Amiel

en_quotes.quote: Every life is a profession of faith, and exercises an inevitable and silent influence
en_quotes.author: Henri Frederic Amiel

en_quotes.quote: First, I prepare. Then I have faith
en_quotes.author: Joe Namath

en_quotes.quote: When in doubt, I choose love above any particular ideas offered to me about faith
en_quotes.author: Glennon Doyle Melton

en_quotes.quote: I must have had faith that day. When I went out, I was Henry Fonda again. An unemployed actor but a man
en_quotes.author: Henry Fonda

en_quotes.quote: For a person to be truly discipled and growing in their faith, they need more than one person discipling them
en_quotes.author: Francis Chan

en_quotes.quote: Without faith that there's a world beyond the one we live in, I don't see how it's possible to get rid of angst
en_quotes.author: Robert Smith

en_quotes.quote: All an actor has is their blind faith that they are who they say they are today, in any scene
en_quotes.author: Meryl Streep

en_quotes.quote: The essence of faith is being satisfied with all that God is for us in Jesus
en_quotes.author: John Piper

en_quotes.quote: Let God be true but every man a liar' is the language of true faith
en_quotes.author: Aiden Wilson Tozer

en_quotes.quote: Bruce Springsteen gave people faith in rock & roll and in themselves again
en_quotes.author: Jimmy Iovine

en_quotes.quote: Faith is not a product of reflection, nor is it even an attempt to penetrate the depths of my own being
en_quotes.author: Pope Benedict XVI

en_quotes.quote: I have faith in the United States and our ability to make good decisions based on the facts
en_quotes.author: Al Gore

en_quotes.quote: I regret any comments I have ever made which may have cast any doubt on the personal faith of our president, Mr. Obama
en_quotes.author: Franklin Graham

en_quotes.quote: My faith means everything to me. God and I talk constantly
en_quotes.author: Sherri Shepherd

en_quotes.quote: My parents just had faith in me, and thank God they did. They weren't stage parents in the slightest
en_quotes.author: Lili Reinhart

en_quotes.quote: Faith is not a thing which one 'loses', we merely cease to shape our lives by it
en_quotes.author: Georges Bernanos

en_quotes.quote: I don't have faith in young people any more. I don't waste time trying to communicate with them
en_quotes.author: Vivienne Westwood

en_quotes.quote: I have great faith in God. Without faith, I don't know how I would have been able to get through what I've been through
en_quotes.author: Marie Osmond

en_quotes.quote: I have faith in God, and I have faith in the fairness of the American people
en_quotes.author: Brett Kavanaugh

en_quotes.quote: Faith in God... produces character; character will produce courage, courage to face the challenges of the day
en_quotes.author: Kirk Cameron

en_quotes.quote: Above all, cancer is a spiritual practice that teaches me about faith and resilience
en_quotes.author: Kris Carr

en_quotes.quote: Governor Pawlenty's commitment to faith and family is not a product of coaching by campaign consultants
en_quotes.author: Sarah Huckabee Sanders

en_quotes.quote: Number one is my faith, number two my family, number three is my friends, and number four, my fans
en_quotes.author: Jim Kelly

en_quotes.quote: I would never have gone anywhere if it hadn't been for Mother's faith and support
en_quotes.author: Patsy Cline

en_quotes.quote: Keeping our priorities straight, our faith, our family, and values will keep us grounded
en_quotes.author: Nick Foles

en_quotes.quote: Our Heavenly Father is pleased when we don't compromise our faith and principles in times of desperation
en_quotes.author: David Green

en_quotes.quote: I'm a man of faith. I only fear God, and my wife - sometimes
en_quotes.author: Lech Walesa

en_quotes.quote: Faith begins where Reason sinks exhausted
en_quotes.author: Albert Pike

en_quotes.quote: I don't care whether I play on the right or in the centre. All I want is for the coach to have faith in me
en_quotes.author: Sergio Ramos

en_quotes.quote: Your faith in yourself is all you will ever have. Don't let anyone take it away from you, ever
en_quotes.author: Holly Marie Combs

en_quotes.quote: I'd be lying if I said I had confidence in every choice I've made, that I have faith in every film I do on every shot
en_quotes.author: Ethan Hawke

en_quotes.quote: Worry is spiritual short sight. Its cure is intelligent faith
en_quotes.author: Paul Brunton

en_quotes.quote: At the core of my dad is, he has a very strong faith. He believes very firmly in loving God
en_quotes.author: Tagg Romney

en_quotes.quote: Faith is like a kernel of wheat
en_quotes.author: Joe Bob Briggs

en_quotes.quote: Much faith will yield unto us here our heaven, but any faith, if true, will yield us heaven hereafter
en_quotes.author: Thomas Brooks

en_quotes.quote: It takes vision and courage to create - it takes faith and courage to prove
en_quotes.author: Owen D. Young

en_quotes.quote: Blind faith in your leaders, or in anything, will get you killed
en_quotes.author: Bruce Springsteen

en_quotes.quote: Science stands for rational thought, faith for superstition and unreason
en_quotes.author: Deepak Chopra

en_quotes.quote: Take away hatred from some people, and you have men without faith
en_quotes.author: Eric Hoffer

en_quotes.quote: Faith, to my mind, is a stiffening process, a sort of mental starch
en_quotes.author: E. M. Forster

en_quotes.quote: Of all the things Christ wants for us, loving Him and focusing our attention on Him are the most important
en_quotes.author: Charles Stanley

en_quotes.quote: Our right to practice our faith freely is respected up to the point where doing so involves harming others
en_quotes.author: Pete Buttigieg

en_quotes.quote: With His love, you can wake up every day with an attitude of faith and expectancy
en_quotes.author: Victoria Osteen

en_quotes.quote: Individual responsibility, hard work, paying attention in school, faith, family all these things are important
en_quotes.author: J. C. Watts

en_quotes.quote: The great act of faith is when a man decides he is not God
en_quotes.author: Oliver Wendell Holmes, Jr.

en_quotes.quote: I'm grateful to God for His bountiful gifts... He gave me courage and faith in myself
en_quotes.author: Loretta Young

en_quotes.quote: Faith is the very first thing you should pack in a hope chest
en_quotes.author: Sarah Ban Breathnach

en_quotes.quote: For both faith and want of faith have destroyed men alike
en_quotes.author: Hesiod

en_quotes.quote: Of all duties, prayer certainly is the sweetest and most easy
en_quotes.author: Laurence Sterne

en_quotes.quote: That is the definition of faith - acceptance of that which we imagine to be true, that which we cannot prove
en_quotes.author: Dan Brown

en_quotes.quote: I am sensitive to the value of faith and religion and spirituality in people's lives because I'm a journalist
en_quotes.author: Peter Jennings

en_quotes.quote: Faith in God's revelation has nothing to do with an ideology which glorifies the status quo
en_quotes.author: Karl Barth

en_quotes.quote: If you've ever questioned your faith, you're going to question it when you are burying your own children
en_quotes.author: Matt Bevin

en_quotes.quote: Have faith in your own thoughts
en_quotes.author: Brooke Shields

en_quotes.quote: No matter how old we become, we can still call them 'Holy Mother' and 'Father' and put a child-like trust in them
en_quotes.author: Desmond Morris

en_quotes.quote: You have to face things, have faith in what you do and go for it. Think, 'What's the worst that could happen?'
en_quotes.author: Annie Lennox

en_quotes.quote: We are a long time in learning that all our strength and salvation is in God
en_quotes.author: David Brainerd

en_quotes.quote: Belief is the most important thing in football. Not quality, running, or being strong but belief, faith, and fight
en_quotes.author: Mauricio Pochettino

en_quotes.quote: I've never made football my priority. My priorities are my faith and my dependence on God
en_quotes.author: Bobby Bowden

en_quotes.quote: True faith is belief in the reality of absolute values
en_quotes.author: William Inge

en_quotes.quote: Fear is the denomination of the Old Testament; belief is the denomination of the New
en_quotes.author: Benjamin Whichcote

en_quotes.quote: I hold that religion and faith are two different things
en_quotes.author: Pat Buckley

en_quotes.quote: All that I am I owe to Jesus Christ, revealed to me in His divine Book
en_quotes.author: David Livingstone

en_quotes.quote: Downtown, one has less time. But there are in Europe much people who have the faith, in South America, too
en_quotes.author: Yannick Noah

en_quotes.quote: The power of faith will often shine forth the most when the character is naturally weak
en_quotes.author: Augustus Hare

en_quotes.quote: Time will tell whether I am a wing nut or a megalomaniac. The difference between a cult and faith is time
en_quotes.author: David Milch

en_quotes.quote: God continues to work miracles in my life
en_quotes.author: Willie Aames

en_quotes.quote: We have one life; it soon will be past; what we do for God is all that will last
en_quotes.author: Charles Studd

en_quotes.quote: I hope I can live up to the faith that has been put in me to do a good job
en_quotes.author: Clementa C. Pinckney

en_quotes.quote: I seek a deeper truth, but I don't think I have to go to a building designated for worship to find it
en_quotes.author: Ted Lange

en_quotes.quote: Faith is reason grown courageous
en_quotes.author: Sherwood Eddy

en_quotes.quote: Faith is not contrary to reason
en_quotes.author: Sherwood Eddy

en_quotes.quote: I think the greatest taboos in America are faith and failure
en_quotes.author: Michael Malone
